15 static const uint32_t MAX_U32_VALUES[] =
16 {
17  0x00U,
18  0x0001U, 0x0003U, 0x0007U, 0x000fU,
19  0x001fU, 0x003fU, 0x007fU, 0x00ffU,

29 {

117 BitStreamWriter::BitStreamWriter() :
118  m_buffer(NULL),
119  m_bitIndex(0),
120  m_bufferBitSize(0),
121  m_hasInternalBuffer(true),
122  m_internalBuffer()
123 {
124 }
125 
126 BitStreamWriter::BitStreamWriter(uint8_t* buffer, size_t bufferByteSize) :
127  m_buffer(buffer),
128  m_bitIndex(0),
129  m_bufferBitSize(bufferByteSize * 8),
130  m_hasInternalBuffer(false),
131  m_internalBuffer()
132 {
133  std::memset(m_buffer, 0, bufferByteSize);
134 }

136 BitStreamWriter::BitStreamWriter(BitBuffer& bitBuffer) :
137  BitStreamWriter(bitBuffer.getBuffer(), bitBuffer.getBitSize())
138 {
139 }

141 BitStreamWriter::~BitStreamWriter()
142 {
143 }

145 void BitStreamWriter::writeBits(uint32_t data, uint8_t numBits)
146 {
147  if (numBits > sizeof(uint32_t) * 8 || data > MAX_U32_VALUES[numBits])
148  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamWriter: Writing of " + convertToString(numBits) + "-bits value '" +
149  convertToString(data) + "' failed.");
150 
151  writeUnsignedBits(data, numBits);
152 }
153 
154 void BitStreamWriter::writeBits64(uint64_t data, uint8_t numBits)
155 {
156  if (numBits > sizeof(uint64_t) * 8 || data > MAX_U64_VALUES[numBits])
157  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamWriter: Writing of " + convertToString(numBits) + "-bits value '" +
158  convertToString(data) + "' failed.");
159 
160  writeUnsignedBits64(data, numBits);
161 }
162 
163 void BitStreamWriter::writeSignedBits(int32_t data, uint8_t numBits)
164 {
165  if (numBits > sizeof(int32_t) * 8 || data < MIN_I32_VALUES[numBits] || data > MAX_I32_VALUES[numBits])
166  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamWriter: Writing of " + convertToString(numBits) + "-bits value '" +
167  convertToString(data) + "' failed.");
168 
169  writeUnsignedBits(static_cast<uint32_t>(data) & MAX_U32_VALUES[numBits], numBits);
170 }
171 
172 void BitStreamWriter::writeSignedBits64(int64_t data, uint8_t numBits)
173 {
174  if (numBits > sizeof(int64_t) * 8 || data < MIN_I64_VALUES[numBits] || data > MAX_I64_VALUES[numBits])
175  throw CppRuntimeException("BitStreamWriter: Writing of " + convertToString(numBits) + "-bits value '" +
176  convertToString(data) + "' failed.");
177 
178  writeUnsignedBits64(static_cast<uint64_t>(data) & MAX_U64_VALUES[numBits], numBits);
179 }
180 
181 void BitStreamWriter::writeVarInt64(int64_t data)
182 {
183  static const uint8_t valBitsVarInt64[] = { 6, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 8 };
184  writeVarNum(data, valBitsVarInt64, sizeof(valBitsVarInt64) / sizeof(valBitsVarInt64[0]),
185  zserio::bitSizeOfVarInt64(data));
186 }
187 
188 void BitStreamWriter::writeVarInt32(int32_t data)
189 {
190  static const uint8_t valBitsVarInt32[] = { 6, 7, 7, 8 };
191  writeVarNum(data, valBitsVarInt32, sizeof(valBitsVarInt32) / sizeof(valBitsVarInt32[0]),
192  zserio::bitSizeOfVarInt32(data));
193 }
194 
195 void BitStreamWriter::writeVarInt16(int16_t data)
196 {
197  static const uint8_t valBitsVarInt16[] = { 6, 8 };
198  writeVarNum(data, valBitsVarInt16, sizeof(valBitsVarInt16) / sizeof(valBitsVarInt16[0]),
199  zserio::bitSizeOfVarInt16(data));
200 }
201 
202 void BitStreamWriter::writeVarUInt64(uint64_t data)
203 {
204  static const uint8_t valBitsVarUInt64[] = { 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 8 };
205  writeVarAbsNum(data, false, valBitsVarUInt64, sizeof(valBitsVarUInt64) / sizeof(valBitsVarUInt64[0]),
206  zserio::bitSizeOfVarUInt64(data));
207 }
208 
209 void BitStreamWriter::writeVarUInt32(uint32_t data)
210 {
211  static const uint8_t valBitsVarUInt32[] = { 7, 7, 7, 8 };
212  writeVarAbsNum(data, false, valBitsVarUInt32, sizeof(valBitsVarUInt32) / sizeof(valBitsVarUInt32[0]),
213  zserio::bitSizeOfVarUInt32(data));
214 }
215 
216 void BitStreamWriter::writeVarUInt16(uint16_t data)
217 {
218  static const uint8_t valBitsVarUInt16[] = { 7, 8 };
219  writeVarAbsNum(data, false, valBitsVarUInt16, sizeof(valBitsVarUInt16) / sizeof(valBitsVarUInt16[0]),
220  zserio::bitSizeOfVarUInt16(data));
221 }
222 
223 void BitStreamWriter::writeVarInt(int64_t data)
224 {
225  static const uint8_t valBitsVarInt[] = { 6, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 8 };
226  if (data == INT64_MIN)
227  writeBits(0x80, 8); // INT64_MIN is encoded as -0
228  else
229  writeVarNum(data, valBitsVarInt, sizeof(valBitsVarInt) / sizeof(valBitsVarInt[0]),
230  zserio::bitSizeOfVarInt(data));
231 }
232 
233 void BitStreamWriter::writeVarUInt(uint64_t data)
234 {
235  static const uint8_t valBitsVarUInt[] = { 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 7, 8 };
236  writeVarAbsNum(data, false, valBitsVarUInt, sizeof(valBitsVarUInt) / sizeof(valBitsVarUInt[0]),
237  zserio::bitSizeOfVarUInt(data));
238 }
239 
240 void BitStreamWriter::writeFloat16(float data)
241 {
242  const uint16_t halfPrecisionFloat = convertFloatToUInt16(data);
243  writeUnsignedBits(halfPrecisionFloat, 16);
244 }
245 
246 void BitStreamWriter::writeFloat32(float data)
247 {
248  const uint32_t singlePrecisionFloat = convertFloatToUInt32(data);
249  writeUnsignedBits(singlePrecisionFloat, 32);
250 }
251 
252 void BitStreamWriter::writeFloat64(double data)
253 {
254  const uint64_t doublePrecisionFloat = convertDoubleToUInt64(data);
255  writeUnsignedBits64(doublePrecisionFloat, 64);
256 }
257 
258 void BitStreamWriter::writeString(const std::string& data)
259 {
260  const size_t len = data.size();
261  BitStreamWriter::writeVarUInt64(len);
262  for (size_t i = 0; i < len; ++i)
263  {
264  BitStreamWriter::writeBits(static_cast<uint8_t>(data[i]), 8);
265  }
266 }
267 
268 void BitStreamWriter::writeBool(bool data)
269 {
270  BitStreamWriter::writeBits((data ? 1 : 0), 1);
271 }
272 
273 void BitStreamWriter::writeBitBuffer(const BitBuffer& bitBuffer)
274 {
275  const size_t bitSize = bitBuffer.getBitSize();
276  writeVarUInt64(bitSize);
277 
278  const uint8_t* buffer = bitBuffer.getBuffer();
279  size_t numBytesToWrite = bitSize / 8;
280  const uint8_t numRestBits = static_cast<uint8_t>(bitSize - numBytesToWrite * 8);
281  const BitPosType beginBitPosition = getBitPosition();
282  if ((beginBitPosition & 0x07) != 0)
283  {
284  // we are not aligned to byte
285  while (numBytesToWrite > 0)
286  {
287  writeUnsignedBits(*buffer, 8);
288  buffer++;
289  numBytesToWrite--;
290  }
291  }
292  else
293  {
294  // we are aligned to byte
295  setBitPosition(beginBitPosition + numBytesToWrite * 8);
296  memcpy(m_buffer + beginBitPosition / 8, buffer, numBytesToWrite);
297  buffer += numBytesToWrite;
298  }
299 
300  if (numRestBits > 0)
301  writeUnsignedBits(*buffer, numRestBits);
302 }
303 
304 void BitStreamWriter::setBitPosition(BitPosType position)
305 {
306  if (position > m_bufferBitSize)
307  {
308  throw BitStreamException("BitStreamWriter: Reached eof(), setting of bit position failed.");
309  }
310 
311  m_bitIndex = position;
312 }
313 
314 void BitStreamWriter::alignTo(size_t alignment)
315 {
316  const BitPosType offset = getBitPosition() % alignment;
317  if (offset != 0)
318  {
319  const uint8_t skip = static_cast<uint8_t>(alignment - offset);
320  writeBits64(0, skip);
321  }
322 }
323 
324 const uint8_t* BitStreamWriter::getWriteBuffer(size_t& writeBufferByteSize) const
325 {
326  writeBufferByteSize = m_bufferBitSize / 8;
327 
328  return m_buffer;
329 }
330 
331 void BitStreamWriter::writeBufferToFile(const std::string& filename) const
332 {
333  std::ofstream os(filename.c_str(), std::ofstream::binary);
334  if (!os)
335  throw CppRuntimeException("WriteBitStreamToFile: Failed to open '" + filename +"' for writing!");
336 
337  os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(m_buffer), m_bufferBitSize / 8);
338  if (!os)
339  throw CppRuntimeException("WriteBitStreamToFile: Failed to write '" + filename +"'!");
340 }
341 
342 inline void BitStreamWriter::writeUnsignedBits(uint32_t data, uint8_t numBits)
343 {
344  if (!hasWriteBuffer())
345  {
346  m_bitIndex += numBits;
347  return;
348  }
349 
350  const size_t freeBitSize = m_bufferBitSize - m_bitIndex;
351  if (numBits > freeBitSize)
352  {
353  if (!m_hasInternalBuffer)
354  throw BitStreamException("BitStreamWriter: Reached eof(), writing to stream failed.");
355 
356  // we have internal buffer which can be resized
357  const size_t missingBytes = (numBits - freeBitSize + 7) / 8;
358  m_internalBuffer.resize(m_internalBuffer.size() + missingBytes);
359  m_buffer = &m_internalBuffer[0];
360  m_bufferBitSize = m_internalBuffer.size() * 8;
361  }
362 
363  const uint8_t org_numBits = numBits;
364  uint8_t bits_free = 8 - (m_bitIndex & 0x07);
365  size_t byte_index = m_bitIndex / 8;
366 
367  if (numBits > bits_free)
368  {
369  // first part
370  m_buffer[byte_index++] |= static_cast<uint8_t>(data >> (numBits - bits_free));
371  numBits -= bits_free;
372 
373  // middle parts
374  while (numBits >= 8)
375  {
376  numBits -= 8;
377  m_buffer[byte_index++] = static_cast<uint8_t>((data >> numBits) & MAX_U32_VALUES[8]);
378  }
379 
380  // reset bits free
381  bits_free = 8;
382  }
383 
384  // last part
385  if (numBits > 0)
386  {
387  m_buffer[byte_index] |= static_cast<uint8_t>((data & MAX_U32_VALUES[numBits]) << (bits_free - numBits));
388  }
389 
390  m_bitIndex += org_numBits;
391 }
392 
393 inline void BitStreamWriter::writeUnsignedBits64(uint64_t data, uint8_t numBits)
394 {
395  if (numBits <= 32)
396  {
397  writeUnsignedBits(static_cast<uint32_t>(data), numBits);
398  }
399  else
400  {
401  writeUnsignedBits(static_cast<uint32_t>(data >> 32), numBits - 32);
402  writeUnsignedBits(static_cast<uint32_t>(data), 32);
403  }
404 }
405 
406 inline void BitStreamWriter::writeVarNum(int64_t value, const uint8_t* valBits, size_t valBitsSize,
407  size_t numVarBits)
408 {
409  const uint64_t absValue = static_cast<uint64_t>(value < 0 ? -value : value);
410  writeVarAbsNum(absValue, value < 0, valBits, valBitsSize, numVarBits);
411 }
412 
413 inline void BitStreamWriter::writeVarAbsNum(uint64_t value, bool sign, const uint8_t* valBits,
414  size_t valBitsSize, size_t numVarBits)
415 {
416  static const uint64_t bitMasks[8] = { 1, 3, 7, 15, 31, 63, 127, 255 };
417  const size_t numVarBytes = bitsToBytes(numVarBits);
418  for (size_t i = numVarBytes; i > 0; i--)
419  {
420  const uint8_t numBits = valBits[numVarBytes - i];
421  if (numBits < 7)
422  {
423  writeBool(sign); // sign
424  }
425  if (numBits < 8)
426  {
427  writeBool(i > 1); // hasNextByte
428  }
429  const size_t shiftBits = (i - 1) * 7 + ((numVarBytes == valBitsSize && i > 1) ? 1 : 0);
430  writeBits(static_cast<uint8_t>((value >> shiftBits) & bitMasks[numBits - 1]), numBits);
431  }
432 }
